short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension for Unix timestamps. Get any date's timestamp and see readable dates for all timestamps in the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension aims at the fastest way of getting any desired Unix timestamps. Quickly just grab the current timestamp, or use the scroll wheel to get to any day, month, year. Click on any field to go to the beginning of that type (eg: click on a month to go to the beginning of that month). 

Also automatically converts all Unix timestamps on a page and adds hover texts. Highlight all timestamps because you can.
